alert.note: Alert for Arapahoe; Washington (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 01 at 4:28PM MDT until August 01 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Arapahoe County in northeastern Colorado... Southwestern Washington County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 515 PM MDT. * At 427 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southwest of Last Chance, or 29 miles north of Limon, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported half dollar size hail southwest of Last Chance. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Last Chance and Woodlin School. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
